Home.aboutTextParagraph1: I am a professional passionate about delivering accessible and functional experiences for all types of users, recognizing the importance of communication in product development. With over 2 years of experience, I have the ability to turn your prototypes into reality with the utmost fidelity.
Home.aboutTextParagraph2: Since 2022, I have been striving to enhance my skills in both design and development. I frequently use Figma to sketch and replicate designs, and technologies such as React, NextJS, Tailwind CSS, C#, Prisma ORM, PlanetScale, and Cloudinary to bring these projects to life.

Library.title: Projects and technologies
Library.description: I primarily work with technologies such as React, NextJS, and TailwindCSS. I use Figma for prototyping my projects. Turn your idea into reality today!
